Articles.Content:
I can't goal the contract item "Have your Ore near Kerbin".

I've try for 2 days several orbits and land near the command centre and the contract item wont match

I'm playing via steam the last version of KSP (windows 8.1 64 bits) and the only mod I have installed is the KerbalAlarmKlock

It look like a bug...

There is an image http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/266091413827271499/B734216C5F80E0DDEF7049642186C02D06A1B0A5/

Thank you in advance for some help

Yeah, that's a bug all right. To get the ore "near Kerbin" all you are supposed to need to do is get it out of the Mun's SOI -- just into a Kerbin orbit is all. But now we have a new version, and you have to test it all over again.
I have a save game to test it
